Description:
Picture Perfect Cracker - Belmont Living at its Best!
Located in the increasingly popular and trendy suburb of Belmont, this updated weatherboard home epitomises upmarket family living at its very best!
Just minutes from the High Street shopping strip and well located in one of Geelongs best school zones, this period stunner provides the young family an affordable, yet excellent quality renovation in the heart of all the action. This quiet location allows for walking distance to immediate amenities.
The family room is spacious, an absolute entertainers dream. The master bedroom includes a walk in robe with full en-suite and the family bathroom services the remaining 3 bedrooms. This homes floor plan can be flexible as you like, with the option of the fourth bedroom being transformed into a second living space, kids retreat, or home office. The classically cool and modern kitchen provides updated cooking appliances and plenty of cupboard space.
Beautiful period features include timber flooring which complement the warm decor with a modern colour palate. The house has zoned central heating and split system cooling. The backyard is fully landscaped with a great little veggie patch, perfect for kids, and boasts a large timber deck for alfresco entertaining all year round. A lock up garage provides ample car accommodation or a great shed for the handyman.
Nothing to spend - just put your feet up and enjoy the best of Belmont living and what is has to offer!
Insights: 19 Mernda Parade, Belmont VIC 3216 was last sold in 2020 and 53 other 4 bedroom house in Belmont have recently been sold.

Description:
Stunning Large Volume Townhouse With Barwon River Views
This cleverly designed and beautifully constructed townhouse is positioned in a quiet street in the popular river end of Belmont. Offering modern, contemporary, low maintenance living without skimping on space. On entry, the tall ceilings and polished hardwood floors create a calm and inviting entry. The large open plan kitchen, dining and living area is ideal for entertaining guests or simply enjoying family time. Large sliding glass doors open onto the north-facing deck, leading to a substantial landscaped backyard and gorgeous heated plunge pool, ideal for those hot summer afternoons.
Taking full advantage of the stunning views over the Barwon River and city skyline is a huge master bedroom complete with ensuite ample robe space and divine parents retreat or second living area. Two large bedrooms with b/in robes, beautiful central bathroom and separate laundry service the downstairs accommodation. Features include double glazed windows, ducted heating and A/C, remote access to the lock-up garage which has workshop/storage area which would be altered to create DLUG.
A true lifestyle location, you can walk to the High Street shopping strip and amenities, Barwon River walking tracks, Geelong CBD, Geelong Train Station and GMHBA Stadium.
- Modern contemporary design with clean lines and an abundance of space.
- Stunning kitchen with stone benchtops and quality appliances.
- Quality bathroom and ensuite with floor to ceiling tiles and freestanding bath.
- Amazing views over the Barwon River and Geelong city skyline.
- Large north entertaining deck, large rear yard and heated plunge pool.
- Gorgeous parents retreat/ second living zone and master with ensuite.
- Polished hardwood floors and tall ceilings throughout.
- Low maintenance lifestyle location close to cafes, restaurants and supermarket.
- Large single lock up garage with workshop/storage area plus second car space.
- High capital growth precinct, ideal for downsizers, couples or young families.
Insights: 8A View Street, Belmont VIC 3216 was last sold in 2020 and 182 other 3 bedroom house in Belmont have recently been sold.

Description:
Freshly Updated & Showcasing Sweeping Views!
Occupying a corner allotment, this spacious residence will impress with freshly updated interiors and a north-facing balcony that boasts sweeping views!
Set in a peaceful pocket of Grovedale, this location is ideal for growing families with Grovedale West P.S, Nazareth Catholic P.S. and Grovedale College all a short stroll away. Public transport and the Burdoo Recreation Reserve are also within close walking distance, along with the Grovedale Community Hub. The Heyers Road shops are a heartbeat away, providing you with Champions IGA and a Medical Centre. Enjoy easy access to the Waurn Ponds Shopping Centre and the Waurn Ponds Train Station.
The home creates a breezy ambience with freshly painted interiors and new flooring throughout most of the house. Northern light sweeps through the generous open plan living/dining zone, which creates the lively hub of the home. The kitchen is well equipped with a walk-in pantry, oven, gas cooktop, and new stainless steel canopy rangehood. Two bedrooms (one with walk-in robe, one with built-in robes) and a versatile study/bedroom share close access to the main bathroom. Complete with a separate entrance and en suite, the 4th bedroom offers immense flexibility. Whether it's a family member who enjoys their own independence or even a home business owner looking to set up shop, this spacious room could be the perfect solution! The laundry completes the downstairs layout.
The upstairs family room, complete with a bathroom, creates a wealth of space for both relaxing and entertaining loved ones. Opening onto the balcony, you'll love that you can admire the far-reaching views over Waurn Ponds and Highton whenever you please.
- New window furnishings to the Lounge, dining and Kitchen and LED lighting
- Two split-system air conditioners and new ducted heating system
- Remote single lock-up garage with internal access
- Lock-up storage room
- Undercover BBQ area
- Landscaped gardens
*All information about the property has been provided to Hayeswinckle by third parties. Hayeswinckle has not verified the information and does not warrant its accuracy or completeness. Parties should make and rely on their own enquiries in relation to this property.
Insights: 14 Carnarvon Drive, Grovedale VIC 3216 was last sold in 2020 and 77 other 4 bedroom house in Grovedale have recently been sold.

Titled and ready to go!
Flawless for those seeking an exceptional allotment in an estate that has seen many quality builds that help underpin your investment. A substantial parcel of approximately 766sqm provides a blank canvas to create your dream.
Well positioned within seamless access to Barrabool Hills Shopping Centre, Montpellier Primary, Highton Village, the Ring Road taking you to Melbourne in an hour, and only a short hop to the Waurn Ponds shopping mecca, Geelong CBD and the Surf Coast. Titled land is in big demand, be sure to enquire now.

Description:
Price on application.
A rare opportunity to secure a property in one of Highton's most sought after locations. Set on a brilliant Residential Growth Zone (RGZ) block of approximately 767m2, with endless potential for development or those seeking to extend. Featuring three bedrooms with built in robes, central bathroom, spacious living, generous kitchen and dining space. Outside opens out to a large north facing backyard, single garage, storage/workshop and carport. Well located within a minutes' walk to the vibrant Highton Village, only minutes from quality local schools, reserves, public transport, peaceful river walks and seamless access to Deakin University, Epworth Hospital and the Ring Road. A truly great opportunity for a vast array of buyers and is sure to bring many out of the woodwork. You can't afford to miss this one.

Description:
Family appeal in sought after Highton address
This large family home is nestled on a sizeable allotment of approx. 777m2 in a desirable court location only minutes to Highton Village, local schools, public transport, tennis courts and the Barwon River. Complimenting this property are the multiple living areas with a formal living room enhanced with a blue stone open fireplace, exposed beams and built in projector and surround sound, there is also an additional family room, creating an ideal hub for get-togethers. The kitchen is ideally positioned connecting beautifully to the dining area, making it the perfect space for those who love to entertain. Completing this level, a powder room, study, additional sitting room and access to an elevated balcony and well-proportioned laundry. On the upper level of this split-level property, there is a master bedroom with walk in robe and ensuite, a further two bedrooms, both large and both with built in robes and a family bathroom which services this zone of the home. On the lower level a brilliant teenage retreat, rumpus room, or home office, depending on your needs and a further two bedrooms with built in robes and a third family bathroom. Family and friends will love the outdoor areas with a large inground heated pool and a timber deck which leads to a covered and private alfresco area and beyond that a great green space for children and pets to enjoy. Extras are plentiful, with double garage providing convenient rear access, ducted heating throughout, split system units and solar panels. In a prized sought-after address with easy access to excellent facilities such as the ring road, Deakin University and The Epworth, you and your family will love this location.
Insights: 2 Tarring Court, Highton VIC 3216 was last sold in 2020 and 29 other 5 bedroom house in Highton have recently been sold.

Description:
Peaceful, private and spacious.
Located in a prime pocket of Leopold, this custom-built family home is perfect for those who are on the hunt for a quality home that that doesn't compromise on space. This beautiful double-storey residence stands tall, and captures stunning views over Geelong, while being close to the shops, adjacent to local parkland and just a 15 minute drive to Geelong.
Comprising 4 large bedrooms, 4 Living areas, 2 bathrooms, 3 toilets, a study, and a private and secure backyard, this property offers great value for money in today's market.
At the heart of the home, the expansive, open plan kitchen features quality cabinetry, gas and electric appliances and overlooks the living and dining area which opens out to a large alfresco perfect for year-round entertaining. A large living area to the front of the home offers walk in storage for all the kid's toys and is adjacent to a fantastic rumpus/billiard room with dedicated gym room complete with rubber flooring.
Upstairs, the luxurious main bedroom offers a walk-in robe and ensuite with double vanity. The remaining 3 bedrooms all feature built in robes and study desks, all serviced by a large central bathroom with separate toilet. A west-facing deck makes great use of the elevated position and captures beautiful views over the region.
Notable features include:
- 2 x Split system air conditioning
- Gas central heating
- Evaporative cooling
- 5kw PV Solar System
- Oversized double garage with rear roller door access to the backyard
- Large laundry with great storage and W/C
This exceptional property is located across the road from the local park, just a short stroll to public transport, a 3-minute drive to Leopold's Gateway Plaza, just 15 minutes to the Geelong Waterfront, 10 minutes to the Bellarine Peninsula and all of its fine wineries, and with easy access to some of Geelong's finest schools, this feature-packed property showcases the superior blend of convenience, practicality, and quality, in one of Geelong's most popular suburbs. Enquire today!
Insights: 3 Manhattan Drive, Leopold VIC 3224 was last sold in 2020 and 94 other 4 bedroom house in Leopold have recently been sold.

Description:
Large family home!
Set high upon the hill in the exclusive Bellrise Park Estate, this huge family home is perfect for multi-generational living with the addition of a guest bedroom with ensuite on the ground level. The expansive open-plan kitchen/dining/living cater easily for the masses, and extend even further onto the north-facing alfresco.
Upstairs you'll find a master suite fit for king and queen, another supersized living space and three further bedrooms that share a bathroom with dual vanity and separate toilet.
You're going to love being so close to Gateway Plaza, and watching the sensational sunsets from your own balcony off the master suite.

Description:
Grab This Opportunity!
Located in a handy and community minded spot, this nearly new homes features include generous living that is perfect for a contemporary lifestyle. Choose from the cosy quiet/media zone with a study nook; or relax and unwind with family and friends in the open plan living area. Here you will find a galley style kitchen with Caesar Stone bench tops, stainless steel appliances, 900mm gas cooking, breakfast bar and large walk in pantry. The adjacent meals and living area enjoys easy flow out to sheltered outdoor entertaining and a private rear garden and lawn.
The master bedroom is sun filled and inviting; it includes a walk-in robe and en-suite. Three additional bedrooms are clustered around a central bathroom with a separate bath and shower. Other highlights include plentiful storage, cosy carpets, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, high ceilings and a modern neutral decor. A double garage and conveniently located laundry complete the floor plan.
Positioned among other quality homes in a quiet and friendly neighbourhood, this property is a short walk to playgrounds, sporting facilities and the much-loved Torquay Farmers Market. Shops, schools, childcare, cafes and beaches are nearby too. First home buyers will love the price point that offers an opportunity to take advantage of the First Home Buyers Grant. While downsizers and investors will see the value here too. With all the hard work already done, both inside and out, simply love it, move in and start living the coastal dream.

Description:
Looking For Space?
Here is a wonderful opportunity to secure a three-bedroom family home on approximately 1321m2, with a double carport and double garage. This property would make an excellent start for your family as it is very liveable as is, while still offering the choice to personalise and upgrade it as you like, in your own time.
The family will love the close location to everything, with the Waurn Ponds North park a short walk away. The locals primary and secondary schools are nearby and there is easy car access to Belmont and Waurn Ponds shopping centres, and the beautiful Surfcoast.
The property may also appeal to the buyer looking to develop the site further (STCA).
Terms: 10% Deposit Settlement 60 Days or sooner by agreement.
For further information text 135grove to 0472 880 610

Description:
75 years in the making.
This beloved family home resting upon 1012m2 (approx.) is ready for you to renovate or detonate and offers endless potential for any savvy investor or developer looking at cornering the Highton market.
Offered to the market for the first time in roughly 75 years, now is your chance to secure a seat in one of Highton's most tightly held locals. You're offered three bedrooms with built-in robes, a generous living area shimmering with natural light, all serviced by a central bathroom, kitchen and dining area. The extensive rear yard presents you with an abundance of options. Model your own family oasis, become the entertainers that all your friends envy or take on the homes outstanding development potential (STCA).
Location cannot be faulted! You're in walking distance to Highton Village, a short drive away from renowned schools for all ages, parks & reserves, public transport and impeccably located near Deakin University, Epworth Hospital and the Geelong CBD. Lichen Grove graces you with convenience and a lifestyle like no other.
Endless opportunities await you.

Description:
Timeless Elegance On Carr
Feel:
Peacefully positioned within steps of the beautiful Barwon River, this thoughtfully restored Edwardian cottage evokes a sense of timeless elegance, a truly unique find for this part of the coast.
Period details honour days gone by with soaring 10ft ceilings gifting a feeling of space and light, whilst modern updates ensure all the comfort youll ever need for a relaxed coastal lifestyle.
The Facts:
-Thoughtfully updated Edwardian cottage 200m from the Barwon River
-980sqm approx. block nestled by a mix of native and cottage gardens
-Originally relocated from the coastal village of Phillip Island
-Period features include ceiling roses, leadlight windows and ornate fireplaces
-Expansive OP living with wood fire flows out to wraparound veranda
-New kitchen features stone benchtops, vast storage and island seating
-Double F&P wall ovens, dishwasher and plenty of soft close drawers
-Master BR at façade with WIR and ensuite, with cosy 2nd living zone
-Minor BRs and traditional family bathroom sit quietly to the rear
-North facing verandah, protected paved terrace with wood/garden shed
-Ducted central heating throughout, ceiling fans, SSAC to living and master
-Games/guest house with ensuite and kitchenette, ideal for holiday rental
-Raised vegie beds and citrus trees gift plenty of seasonal produce
-Remote DLUG, laundry with excellent storage and ext. access
-Within a walk or bike ride to Primary School, cafes and beaches
The Owner Loves....
We love the character and charm of the house, weve held many family get togethers here whether its footy by the fire or parties in the games room. It takes us just over a minute to walk to the jetty, and the riverside board-walks surrounded by mangroves and moonah trees is what makes this area so special.

Description:
CLASSIC COUNTRY RESIDENCE ON IDYLLIC ACREAGE
This quaint, mud brick homestead situated in Bellbrae presents an opportunity for those seeking charm, space, and serenity. The property sits on 6 acres (approx.) of natural bushland with beautiful valley views.
The traditional floor plan comprises 3 generous bedrooms with a family bathroom/semi-en-suite, separate toilet, open plan timber pine kitchen and dining with wood heater and a fantastic sized separate lounge room boasting a cosy open fireplace and large laundry. The homestead has a characteristic wrap-around verandah enabling you to catch the sun from any direction and features a fernery outlook to the west.
The properties improvements include two water tanks, a 6 x 8 metre double garage/workshop, double carport with storeroom/hobby room, 1 dam, chook pen, bird enclosure and plenty of cleared areas to enjoy.
Bellbrae township is within easy reach and only approximately 10-minute drive to Torquay, Anglesea and all its amenities, ideally positioned for those who enjoy a tranquil bush walk with the Iron bark basin close by. We welcome you to inspect this rural property, call today for further information.
Insights: 590 Great Ocean Road, Bellbrae VIC 3228 was last sold in 2020 and 4 other 4 bedroom house in Bellbrae have recently been sold.

Description:
A rare offering
Set on a perfectly positioned 1980m2 (approx.) in the heart of the idyllic rural community of Ceres, this unique family home needs to be seen to be appreciated. Ceres sits atop the beautiful Barrabool Hills, just beyond neighbouring Highton, and has its own fascinating history. The township features traditional sandstone buildings, a primary school, sporting facilities and is just a short drive to the Ring Road and ever-popular Highton shopping and cafe precinct. The home is surrounded in secluded privacy thanks to the established trees, lawn and gardens providing the perfect place to relax, escape life's hustle and bustle and enjoy the quiet tranquillity of village life. The home boasts four bedrooms, a master bedroom with ensuite and walk in robe, a home office, two bathrooms, multiple living and entertaining zones and a separate laundry. Outside you will find a swimming pool, an undercover outdoor entertaining area, a double garage which is currently being used as a gym and a further four car garage. An inspection is a must.
For more information on this property text '6 Thomas' to 0428 444 841
GO TO www.whitfordproperty.com.au TO VIEW MORE PROPERTIES EXCLUSIVE TO OUR WEBSITE ONLY

Description:
Value Packed Exceptional Family Home
The perfect opportunity awaits for the growing family or keen investor in this prime Grovedale location. Located within walking distance to the Marshall Train Station, Grovedale Reserve, Grovedale Primary School and the local IGA giving you the convenience of having everything you need at your fingertips.
Neatly presented and offering the ideal layout, this home consists of four generous sized bedrooms, the main with a walk-in wardrobe and private ensuite, giving you plenty of room to relax. The remaining bedrooms offer built in robes and utilise the central bathroom and separate toilet.
Upon entering the property you are greeted with a large, sun-filled, north facing lounge room and a practical tiled entry that leads you through to the second living, meals and the timeless black-wood kitchen area. The quality kitchen offers near-new stainless steel appliances, including a dishwasher.
Whilst the sizable living zone provides you with functionality, it also allows you access to the impressive entertaining area with undercover pergola. A perfect space to enjoy with family and friends. Completing this functional floorplan is the fully equipped laundry with built in closet & large linen cupboard.
The expansive rear yard is blank canvass with ample space for you to create your dream yard & perfect for the children to play. Furthermore, the exterior offers a double remote garage with internal access and drive through vehicle access to the large backyard. To the side of the garage is additional parking allowing ample room for a trailer, caravan or boat to be stored with ease.
Added extras include: central heating, new refrigerated cooling and ducted vacuum system which is ideal for family living. This home is suitable for a large majority of buyers & an inspection truly is a must to understand the quality and convenience this home offers.
Insights: 62 Smith Street, Grovedale VIC 3216 was last sold in 2014 and 77 other 4 bedroom house in Grovedale have recently been sold.

Description:
A peaceful home with plenty of location appeal!
For sale by Openn Negotiation (flexible conditions online auction). The Openn Negotiation is under way and the property can sell at any time. Contact Olivia or Shaun immediately to become qualified and avoid disappointment. Open to all buyers including subject to finance.
https://www.openn.com.au/app/search/list?searchstring=2%20Capri%20Court,%20Jan%20Juc%203228,%20Victoria,%20Australia&page=1
Youll love:
Listening to the waves from the sunny rear deck of this classic Jan Juc home - located in an idyllic spot thats only one row back from the ocean and in a quiet & friendly court.
The homes elevated, single level layout is simple, spacious, and easy to maintain; while its large undercover verandah is the perfect place to unwind.
The vaulted ceiling & wood heater in the open plan kitchen/living area adds a lovely sense of warmth & appeal.
An abundance of outdoor space for getting as creative in as you like or you can simply leave it as is and enjoy all the sunshine it receives!
Plus:
The spacious master bedroom includes an ensuite & triple built-in robe, while bedrooms 2 & 3 are of good-size and have BIRs.
Theres also a main bathroom with a claw foot bath, separate toilet, plus a laundry with external side access.
Enjoy the added comfort of a split system a/c in the main living & continuous gas hot water too.
The backyard is fully fenced, has a lockable garden shed & room to store a trailer via the side gate.
Located 500m from the Steps car park & with the potential to unlock ocean views from a 2nd storey (STCA) this Jan Juc home will appeal to owner/occupiers, Airbnb hosts & investors alike.

Description:
Looking For The Perfect Family Home?
Dont miss this opportunity to embrace the family lifestyle youve been craving! Showcasing stylish interiors, a sun-drenched alfresco deck and backyard vehicle access, this home is simply irresistible!
Positioned in a family-friendly pocket of Leopold, this location will leave you wanting nothing. A short stroll will find you at the Bellarine Rail Trail or Hoddle Drive Playground, where you can enjoy some outdoor family fun. Public transport is within easy walking distance, while both Leopold Sportsmans Club and the Gateway Plaza are close by. Easy access to Leopold Primary School, Leopold Community Hub and the Leopold Library will delight families. To top it all off, the Portarlington Highway grants access to the Geelong CBD and Bellarine Peninsula.
Showcasing contemporary style, the interiors exude a calming ambience throughout the home. With both the lounge and open plan living zone capturing the northern light, an enticing setting is created for everyday living. The lounge provides the perfect spot to relax or can even be set up as the ultimate kids retreat. The open plan living/dining/kitchen zone flows onto the backyard and alfresco deck via glass stacker doors. Complete with a built-in bench, youll love that you can kick back on the deck with friends as the kids play in the secure backyard. The picture-perfect kitchen will impress with stone benchtops, a walk-in pantry, and stainless steel appliances (dishwasher and 900mm oven, gas cooktop, rangehood).
Zoned to the front of the home, the dreamy Master Bedroom features a walk-in robe and en suite with large shower, dual vanity and toilet. Three additional bedrooms boast built-in robes. The main bathroom, laundry with external access, and separate toilet complete the layout. Ducted heating and a split-system air conditioner keep you comfortable in all seasons. The remote double lock-up garage features internal access, while secure side vehicle access provides additional vehicle storage perfect for caravans, boats or trailers!
With the elements in place for fine family living, youll need to act quickly to avoid disappointment!
Insights: 34 Blake Drive, Leopold VIC 3224 was last sold in 2020 and 94 other 4 bedroom house in Leopold have recently been sold.

Description:
An Effortless Lifestyle Awaits In Leopold!
Whether youre an astute investor, young family, or simply looking for a low-maintenance lifestyle without compromising on space, this home is the one for you!
The local sporting grounds and playground with BBQ facilities are a short walk from your front door - providing plenty of outdoor areas for everyone to enjoy. Public transport is also within walking distance, while the Gateway Plaza and Gateway Sanctuary are wonderfully close by. Young families will enjoy easy access to Leopold P.S and the Leopold Community Hub.
Glossy floor tiles and square-set ceilings enhance the interiors. The open plan living/dining/kitchen zone establishes the heart of the home while flowing onto the sheltered alfresco. This indoor-outdoor flow is ideal for modern-day living or casual gatherings with loved ones.
The kitchen features black stone benchtops, a large walk-in pantry, and an island bench/breakfast bar. Stainless steel appliances include a dishwasher and 900mm oven, gas hob, and canopy rangehood.
Zoned to the front of the home, the lounge creates another generous spot for either relaxation or play. With both the lounge and front entrance able to be sectioned off from the main living zone, this room will also appeal to home business owners.
Two bedrooms with built-in robes complete the lower level, along with the main bathroom, powder room, and laundry with ample storage.
Upstairs, the study nook opens onto a balcony that captures west-facing views over Geelong what better way to unwind at the end of a day than by watching the sunset!
The Master Bedroom is graced with views, a walk-in robe, and en suite with large shower, single vanity, and toilet.
Ducted heating and two split-system air conditioners keep you comfortable all year long.
The secure backyard provides a private play space for young children or pets. A rainwater tank helps to keep the easy-care gardens in tip-top condition. The remote double lock-up garage features internal access, plus access to storage under the staircase. Investors will appreciate that the home is currently tenanted.
When it comes to effortless living, this home packs a punch! Inspect ASAP!

Description:
Fantastic Family Lifestyle
Less than five years old, this residence ticks every box for superb family living! The spacious outdoor entertaining area will delight, while secure side vehicle access is a huge plus. This property also presents an ideal opportunity for eligible first homebuyers to secure the First Home Owners Grant.
With both the Bellarine Rail Trail and Hoddle Drive Playground within easy walking distance, the whole family will be enticed to venture outdoors. The Leopold Sportsmans Club is also close by, while the Gateway Plaza will leave you wanting nothing. Young families are taken great care of with easy access to kindergartens and Leopold Primary School. Public transport is moments away, while the Portarlington Highway keeps you connected to Geelong and the Bellarine Peninsula.
With the interiors in immaculate condition, every inch of this home feels just like new. The central lounge inspires relaxation, while the open plan living/dining/kitchen zone is bathed in an abundance of natural light. The open plan living zone opens onto both the backyard and covered outdoor entertaining area, which sets the scene for many casual barbeques and lively gatherings with loved ones. The kitchen showcases stone benchtops, a built-in pantry and stainless steel appliances (dishwasher, oven, gas cooktop, rangehood).
Overlooking the front garden, the generous Master Bedroom is graced with a walk-in robe and en suite. Two additional bedrooms with built-in robes are tucked away in a separate wing, along with the main bathroom and separate toilet. The laundry is complete with storage and external access. Ducted heating and two split-system air conditioners keep you in the utmost comfort. Lined with easy care gardens, the generous backyard creates a secure play space for children and pets alike. The remote double lock-up garage features internal access, while a side gate provides secure vehicle access to the backyard.

Description:
An Ideal Setting Matched By A Flawless Location
The picture-perfect presentation of this alluring family home will immediately strike a chord amongst those searching for a quality home in a fashionable family setting. Modern in design and situated in an iconic family-friendly location thats within walking distance to walking tracks, bike trails as well as a short drive to some of the best surf coast beaches in the country!
With modern finishes throughout the home demonstrates style and sophistication with its up-to-date design. An inviting environment offering three spacious bedrooms that all include built in robes, a large main bedroom with a convenient ensuite. The large open plan kitchen, dining and living area will be the talking point amongst buyers, starting with the stylish kitchen offering quality bench tops, stainless steal appliances, ample storage space, large pantry and dishwasher. Flowing on from the kitchen is a spacious dinning area that offers easy access to its own outdoor entertaining space while the family living area is neighboring. The remaining bedrooms are positioned at the rear of the home serviced by the family bathroom that includes shower, bath and vanity while a separate toilet and laundry is located adjacent.
Ducted gas heating throughout, split system air-conditioning and north facing aspects capture plenty of natural flowing light throughout which completes the inside of this family abode.
All situated on a great corner allotment of 458m2 (approx.), quietly positioned under this Leopold address but still close to all the action. Primary and secondary schools, public transport and the Geelong Ring Road are all only moments away.
Take advantage of the peaceful surroundings, simply move in, relax and dont worry about a thing.

Description:
COASTAL FAMILY LIVING HAS NEVER LOOKED SO GOOD
This exceptional family home in the popular Surf View Estate offers an outstanding living environment and will appeal to those who demand quality, position and lifestyle. Bursting with natural light, this property is only seconds from primary schools, parks and is highlighted by sophisticated living with spacious interiors, superb entertaining zones and quality finishes throughout.
Designed with a chefs touch in mind, the deluxe kitchen includes a huge stone island benchtop, soft close cabinetry throughout, stainless steel appliances, dishwasher and walk in pantry that will not disappoint. All of this is adjoined by the meals and family room complete with gas log fire and bi fold doors that lead to the outdoor entertaining area. Also on this level is an informal lounge, powder room and laundry with great storage plus stone benchtops.
Upstairs comprises of a great sized master bedroom which includes walk in robe and ensuite with floor to ceiling tiles, dual vanity and stone benchtops. The other three bedrooms all have built in robes with two of the bedrooms having ocean views. Add to this a third living area, central main bathroom again with floor to ceiling tiles and stone bench top and separate toilet.
Features include internal access to remote controlled double garage, extensive decking both at the front and back of house, ducted heating and cooling throughout, alarm system, dual blinds, plenty of storage and low maintenance landscaped gardens.
This home is perfect for any growing family that is looking for a quality home in a great location.
